name: Slaad Tadpole
description: A small, wriggling tadpole with a chaotic nature and distinct characteristics.
memorable: Its ability to resist magic makes it a unique threat compared to typical weak creatures.
goals: Typically seeks to survive and grow, often hiding to avoid danger.
relations: Related to larger Slaad creatures, it might be found near them or in the same environment.
environment: Often found in chaotic or wild areas where its larger kin dwell.
strengths: Has resistance to various elemental damage types.
weaknesses: Low health and poor physical stats make it vulnerable in direct combat.
attacks: Uses a bite attack to inflict piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance allows it to avoid many harmful spells.
skills: Possesses a stealth skill, allowing it to remain concealed from prying eyes.
additional_information: Resistant to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage.
Understands the Slaad language but cannot speak.
Chaotic nature influences its behavior and interactions.
test_queries: chaotic tiny tadpole with magic resistance
small monster that resists elemental damage
tiny aberration that seeks to survive
stealthy tadpole living in chaotic areas
